mapper.select: select a.* from aweb_organization a join aweb_user_organization b on a.id = b.org_id and b.user_id = #{userId} where a.lvl <= #{lvl} and a.type = 'local_net'

select a.* from aweb_organization a join aweb_organization b on b.type = 'local_net' and b.data = #{data} join aweb_user_organization c on a.id = c.org_id and c.user_id = #{userId} where a.lvl = 1 or (a.lvl = 2 and a.id = b.id) or (a.lvl = 3 and a.parent_id = b.id) and a.type = 'local_net' order by a.lvl asc, a.sorting desc
